scripts.docs: del docs/api && typedoc --theme markdown --readme none --excludePrivate  --excludeInternal --exclude ./src/globals.d.ts --out docs/api ./src
scripts.build:cjs: del dist/cjs && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir dist/cjs --extensions .ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx --source-maps
scripts.build:esm: del dist/esm && cross-env BABEL_ENV=esm NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir dist/esm --extensions .ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx --source-maps
scripts.build: yarn type:build && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:esm
scripts.build:watch: del dist/cjs && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjsWatch NODE_ENV=development babel src --out-dir dist/cjs --extensions .ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx --source-maps --watch
